statements: UPDATE student_attendance SET participation_score = 90, attendance_status = TRUE WHERE student_id = 1234;
UPDATE student_attendance SET class_time = '10:30:00', class_date = '2023-05-15' WHERE student_id = 5678;
UPDATE student_attendance SET attendance_status = true, participation_score = 95 WHERE student_id = 123 AND class_date = '2022-08-15'
UPDATE student_attendance SET participation_score = 80, attendance_status = false WHERE class_date = '2022-08-17' AND student_id = 456
UPDATE students SET attendance_status = true WHERE student_id = 123;
UPDATE classes SET class_date = '2022-10-15', class_duration = 90 WHERE class_id = 456;
UPDATE students SET student_name='Alice', attendance_status=true WHERE student_id=1;
UPDATE classes SET teacher_name='Mr. Smith', class_date='2022-05-15', class_duration=90 WHERE class_id=2;

UPDATE Attendance SET status = 'Present' WHERE student_id = 2 AND class_id = 1;

UPDATE Attendance SET date = '2022-10-15', status = 'Present' WHERE student_id = 2 AND class_id = 1

UPDATE attendance SET present = TRUE WHERE class_id = 101 AND date = '2022-01-01';
